    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChoosePet
    Provides a graphical interface for selecting a pet type.
    Gameplay
    Gameplay Objects open a gameplay UI screen based on a loaded Pet from a csv file

    Example Use:
    Inventory
    The Inventory class extends JFrame, providing a graphical user interface to display an inventory of items.
    Item
    Item ojetcs store the ammount of 1 of 6 items

    Example Use:
    LoadCreateGame
    This screen gives users the opportunity to load an existing pet or create a new pet;
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu window for the "Perfect Pet Pals" game.
    MusicPlayer
    The MusicPlayer class provides static methods to play, pause, resume, and stop looping background music for the application using Java's javax.sound.sampled API.
    NameAttribute
    Within the create a pet process, brings a user to a screen where they can name their pet and see attributes.
    ParentalControls
    Parental Controls screen where users can restrict app usage, see statistics, and revive pets.
    ParentalLoginScreenUI
    The ParentalLoginScreenUI class creates a login screen for accessing parental controls.
    PasueScreenUI
    Provides a graphical interface for the game pause screen.
    Pet
    The Pet class represents the state and behavior of a virtual pet.
    TitleScreenUI
    TitleScreenUI Objects open a title screen, this class contains the main method for the project

    Example Use:
    TutorialUI
    Provides a graphical interface for this game's tutorial information.
